title: Handle Guest Request for Accessible Seating
description: A guest who purchased standard tickets has since broken their leg and now requires wheelchair accessible seating.

tasks.description: Look up the guest's original order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the guest's original ticket purchase.

tasks.description: Check the availability of unsold accessible seats for the event.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds an available wheelchair space with a companion seat.

tasks.description: Process an exchange for the guest's original tickets to the new accessible seats.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully voids the old tickets and issues the new ones.

tasks.description: Inform the guest of their new seat location and offer to arrange for wheelchair assistance upon arrival.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the new details and logs a request for assistance.
